description: In New York, widely regarded as a gay-friendly city, reports of attacks on same-sex couples are on the rise. Here, one young couple tells their story.
title: An Attack on Equality
title_page: An Attack on Equality - Video - NYTimes.com
text: A collection of the second season from 2013. Op-Docs is the editorial departmentâ€™s channel for short opinion documentaries, produced by independent filmmakers.
